Name: Honey Wall
Ingredients: 40 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
25 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Dick Bradsell at Downstairs at Alfred's in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Wall contains 230 calories
